• Worked as software QA Engineer in Google Project Tango, an exploration into giving mobile devices a human-scale understanding of space and motion.  
• Developed and designed Power Consumption System for Project Tango specific hardware devices using C and Python; measured power consumption for software component of tango API as well as Thermal Design Point for Tango Devices.

• Detected and analyzed bugs; narrow down to the root cause of the bug. Created quality bug reports in Atlassian JIRA bug tracking system by including log output, application version, and system build versions, etc.  
• Created and implemented test plans, test cases, and train non-technical staff on conducting manual testing, and tracking testing report; train non-technical staff on running script for flashing devices with various build system, installing Android Applications for devices, and conducting camera calibration.
